narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Glass Mental Health Foundation INC is a Clinic/Center provider based in Timonium, MD. From 2018-01 through 2019-08, this provider received $263K in Medicaid payments across 4K claims serving 1K beneficiaries, billing 2 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: Bills 3.5× the national median for H0020 (H0020), at $66 per claim vs. the median of $19. This places them well above the 99th percentile nationally.
75% of billing is concentrated in H0020 (H0020), indicating significant specialization in this service.
Billing stopped in 2019-08, suggesting this provider is no longer active in Medicaid. Abrupt cessation of billing can be a risk indicator.
